ygData.subject: RE: Ancient Cyclops
ygData.msgSnippet: I have personally saw it in South Ro, but only once out of many times there. I would guess it rotates spawn zones or something strange like that. Friends have
ygData.messageBody:
I have personally saw it in South Ro, but only once out of many times there.
I would guess it rotates spawn zones or something strange like that.
Friends have seen it in OOT, Oasis and others.
Zebbi (44 Level Wizard E'Ci)

-----Original Message-----
From: Lim Dul [mailto:sevendegrees@...]
Sent: Friday, November 05, 1999 12:21 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Ancient Cyclops


From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>

>YEah i am
>and i am up for the acumen mask
>i hope i will be able to log on tho. We hace sometrubble conecting >from
>Europe.

>Askur Wizzie of Veeshan

Great, anybody else see me online and want ta join up to do some quests, I'm
game. Give me a tell if you see me Askur.

Anyway, can anybody here confirm that there IS such a thing as an Ancient
Cyclops that wanders S. Ro? Nobody I know has ever seen it. I went there
last night and asked around...nobody there knew either. Trying to find that
ring off of it for JBoots.

On a side note, Shock Spiral of Al'Kabor isn't bad. I finally tried some AE
against those deepwater goblin pets. 113 dmg for all MoBs around me and it
didn't seem to ever get interrupted despite getting whacked at from 3 or 4
Mobs at once. I like how it kicks back a little too...keeps you out of the
fray for a while longer. You guys who use AE might be on to something
here..... ;)

-- Lim'Dul
30 Wiz Veeshan
